title: Terminator 2
synopsis: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

title: Strange Days
synopsis: A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

title: Knowing
synopsis: An MIT astrophysics professor and his son unearth a string of numbers from a time capsule that seem to reveal a cataclysm that will wipe out humanity.

title: Transcendence
synopsis: Two computer scientists work to achieve technological singularity to create a world where computers can transcend the abilities of the human brain.

title: TAU
synopsis: Kidnapped by an inventor who uses her as a test subject to perfect his robotic AI a street-smart young woman tries to escape her high-tech prison.

title: The Box
synopsis: A couple must decide whether to push a button that will net them a million dollars but that will also cause the death of a complete stranger.

title: The Signal
synopsis: During their drive across the country college pals Nick and Jonah – accompanied by Nick's girlfriend – run into major trouble in the Nevada desert.

title: Lady in the Water
synopsis: When an apartment building manager discovers a water nymph in the complex's swimming pool he tries to help her return to her mythical home.

title: Mute
synopsis: When his girlfriend vanishes a mute man ventures into a near-future Berlin's seamy underworld where his actions speak louder than words.

title: 2036 Origin Unknown
synopsis: Working with an artificial intelligence to investigate the failure of a deadly Mars landing a mission controller makes an astonishing discovery.

title: Selfless
synopsis: A dying tycoon has his consciousness transplanted into the body of a healthy young man only to make a troubling discovery about the body's origin.

title: White Chamber
synopsis: When a civil war ravages the UK a scientist awakens in a futuristic cell and is tortured by her captor for information she claims she doesn't possess.

title: Creed
synopsis: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

title: Furious 7
synopsis: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

title: Suicide Squad
synopsis: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

title: Good People
synopsis: A struggling couple can't believe their luck when they find a stash of money in the apartment of a neighbor who was recently murdered.

title: Kidnapping Mr. Heineken
synopsis: When beer magnate Alfred "Freddy" Heineken is kidnapped in 1983 his abductors make the largest ransom demand in history.

title: Moonwalkers
synopsis: A brain-addled war vet a failing band manager and a Stanley Kubrick impersonator help the CIA construct an epic scam by faking the 1969 moon landing.

title: Hell and Back
synopsis: When best friends break a blood oath one of them is cast away to hell and the other two must save him from the misfits of the underworld.

title: Black Panther
synopsis: T'Challa the superpowered new leader of the hidden highly advanced African nation of Wakanda strives to protect his home from enemies old and new.

title: The Debt Collector
synopsis: A broke martial arts instructor takes a side gig with a mobster who pairs him with a veteran thug for a weekend of fisticuffs-fueled debt collection.

title: Act of Vengeance
synopsis: Two Turkish agents are sent to New York City on a mission to capture a notorious terrorist known only as "Dejjal" (Arabic for Antichrist).

title: Animal World
synopsis: An unlucky debt-ridden teen resorts to his math skills when he's forced into a deadly tournament of rock-paper-scissors run by a diabolical host.

title: Hold the Dark
synopsis: In the grim Alaskan winter a naturalist hunts for wolves blamed for killing a local boy but he soon finds himself swept into a chilling mystery.

title: The Grandmaster
synopsis: As the Japanese invasion looms Chinese kung fu master Ip Man's world changes when rival master Gong Er and her father arrive in his village.

title: The Hurricane Heist
synopsis: A deadly hurricane with mile-high waves provides the perfect cover for stealing $600 million from a U.S. Treasury outpost in Mississippi.

title: Furie
synopsis: When traffickers kidnap her daughter from their village vengeful Hai Phuong returns to Saigon – and her outlaw roots – to take down the abductors.

title: USS Indianapolis: Men of Courage
synopsis: After becoming stranded in the Philippine Sea during World War II a tenacious Navy crew faces a dire lack of supplies and a string of shark attacks.

title: Inside Man: Most Wanted
synopsis: A hotshot NYPD negotiator butts heads with the FBI and meets his match in a meticulous criminal mastermind as she attempts to rob the Federal Reserve.

title: China Salesman
synopsis: A Chinese engineer travels to a war-torn African country to rebuild its telecommunications but instead finds massive corruption and explosive danger.

title: The Bund
synopsis: After losing everything a young man rebuilds his life and finds love in 1920s Shanghai – all while rising to power in an organized crime syndicate.

title: Bitcoin Heist
synopsis: A unconventional efficient Interpol special agent goes rogue and assembles a team of thieves to catch a shadowy hacker called "The Ghost.

title: Avengement
synopsis: Betrayed by his loan shark brother a hardened convict escapes from prison while on furlough to exact revenge against the people who made him a killer.

title: Five Elements Ninjas
synopsis: When five ninjas whose fighting styles are based on natural elements unleash their fury on a rival school a lone survivor vows deadly revenge.

title: ​​Goli Soda 2
synopsis: A taxi driver a gangster and an athlete struggle to better their lives despite obstacles like crooked politicians evil dons and caste barriers.

title: Rumble
synopsis: An ex-MMA champion reduced to fixing fights in Mexico must win one last match to save his girlfriend who's been kidnapped by the mob.

title: First Kill
synopsis: A stock broker brings his young son back to the town where he grew up for a hunting trip but things take a dangerous turn when they witness a crime.

title: Finding Nemo
synopsis: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

title: Frog kingdom
synopsis: Princess Froglegs goes undercover to compete in her father's Froglympics in order to avoid being married off to a male suitor.

title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2
synopsis: The Turtles get into another battle with their enemy the Shredder, who has acquired new allies: the mutant thugs Bebop and Rocksteady and the alien being Krang.

title: The Incredibles
synopsis: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.

title: Toy Story
synopsis: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

title: Norm of the North: King Sized Adventure
synopsis: Before planning an awesome wedding for his grandfather a polar bear king must take back a stolen artifact from an evil archaeologist first.

title: Transformers Prime
synopsis: With the help of three human allies the Autobots once again protect Earth from the onslaught of the Decepticons and their leader Megatron.

title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise
synopsis: When a prison ship crash unleashes hundreds of Decepticons on Earth Bumblebee leads a new Autobot force to protect humankind.

title: Next Gen
synopsis: When lonely Mai forms an unlikely bond with a top-secret robot they embark on an intense action-packed adventure to foil the plot of a vicious villain.

title: Archibald's Next Big Thing
synopsis: Happy-go-lucky chicken Archibald may not remember to do his chores but he never forgets to have fun. After all life's an adventure!

title: Ben 10
synopsis: Ben can transform into ten types of aliens. He'll try 'em all while adventuring across the country with his cousin Gwen and Grandpa Max.

title: Bridget Jones's Baby
synopsis: Forty-something and single again, Bridget decides to focus on her job and surround herself with friends. In a twist, she finds herself pregnant, but with one hitch - she can only be fifty percent sure of the identity of her baby's father.

title: Nine Lives
synopsis: A stuffy businessman finds himself trapped inside the body of his family's cat.

title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
synopsis: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

title: Fabrizio Copano: Solo pienso en mi
synopsis: Fabrizio Copano takes audience participation to the next level in this stand-up set while reflecting on sperm banks family WhatsApp groups and more.

title: Joaquín Reyes: Una y no más
synopsis: Comedian and celebrity impersonator Joaquín Reyes decides to be his zesty self for a night of stories about buses bathroom habits royalty and more.

title: Manhattan Romance
synopsis: A filmmaker working on a documentary about love in modern Manhattan becomes personally entangled in the romantic lives of his subjects.

title: Sierra Burgess Is A Loser
synopsis: A wrong-number text sparks a virtual romance between a smart but unpopular teen and a sweet jock who thinks he's talking to a gorgeous cheerleader.

title: Ee Nagaraniki Emaindi
synopsis: In Goa and in desperate need of cash four childhood friends get another shot at making their long-abandoned dreams of becoming filmmakers come true.

title: Kill Me If You Dare
synopsis: Bogged down with money problems a couple grows cautious of each other but hit the lottery and decide to stay together – till death do they part.

title: PK
synopsis: Aamir Khan teams with director Rajkumar Hirani to play a social crusader in a political satire on the state of corruption in India.

title: ATM
synopsis: When a broken ATM dishes out a fortune a couple who works at the bank vies to see who can recover the most cash – and the loser must find a new job.

title: Bangkok Traffic (Love) Story
synopsis: After an encounter with an engineer working the night shift for the city train a 30-year-old woman struggles against all odds to pursue true love.

title: Automata
synopsis: In a dystopian future an insurance adjuster for a tech company investigates a robot killed for violating protocol and discovers a global conspiracy.

title: The Spy
synopsis: In the 1960s Israeli clerk-turned-secret agent Eli Cohen goes deep undercover inside Syria on a perilous years-long mission to spy for Mossad.

title: The Royal House of Windsor
synopsis: Drawing on newly available info this show traces how the British royal family has survived the last 100 years of power struggles politics and more.

title: Lovesick
synopsis: Love and academics get complicated at an all-male college that happens to be located next to an all-female high school.

title: Mak Cun
synopsis: A woman with an entrepreneurial spirit takes life into her own hands by starting a beauty cream business that inspires other women to take chances.

title: Paul Hollywood's Big Continental Road Trip
synopsis: Gear up for a fast-paced journey as celebrity chef and avid auto enthusiast Paul Hollywood takes in the cars and culture of France Italy and Germany.

title: Satu Hari
synopsis: A man haunted by his wife's affair moves to Sarajevo and starts to love again until fate forces him to choose between his new life and old loyalty.

title: Domino
synopsis: A Copenhagen police officer hunts for the man who attacked his partner only to stumble into a high-stakes game of espionage.

title: Made in Mexico
synopsis: These Mexico City socialites may lead opulent lives but a peek behind the curtain reveals a tangled web of intrigue envy and personal struggles.

title: Bard of Blood
synopsis: Years after a disastrous job in Balochistan a former Indian spy must confront his past when he returns to lead an unsanctioned hostage-rescue mission.

title: Malaal
synopsis: Class divides become thorns in the budding romance between the crony of a nativist Mumbai politician and the new North Indian resident of his chawl.

title: Vagabond
synopsis: When his nephew dies in a plane crash stunt man Cha Dal-geon resolves to find out what happened with the help of covert operative Go Hae-ri.

title: Criminal: UK
synopsis: Within the walls of an interrogation room and with time running out London investigators go after three suspects each accused of a grievous crime.

title: The Hockey Girls
synopsis: The passionate members of a girls' roller hockey team chase down victories in the rink while striving to make time for school family and romance.

title: When the Camellia Blooms
synopsis: Dongbaek is a single mother. When a potential new love enters her life she finds ways to defy the social stigmas surrounding her.

title: Forget Me Not
synopsis: Teenage Xue Ming was forced to marry the man who raped her. Years after abandoning her young sons to find a better life can she escape the guilt?

title: Timeless Season
synopsis: A decade after college a wake reunites five female friends struggling with illness infidelity toxic in-laws spousal abuse and other life issues.

title: The Golden Age
synopsis: A seemingly perfect family looks to fix their problems with the help of Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman.

title: Whiplash
synopsis: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

title: Justin Timberlake + the Tennessee Kids
synopsis: On the final nights of a world tour director Jonathan Demme captures what makes the show soar: gifted musicians deft dancers and a magnetic star.

title: Barbra: The Music ... The Mem'ries ... The Magic!
synopsis: Iconic songstress Barbra Streisand culminates her 13-city tour in Miami with dazzling ballads Broadway standards and stories from behind the scenes.

title: Loudon Wainwright III: Surviving Twin
synopsis: Grammy-winning singer Loudon Wainwright III reflects upon his unique relationship with his father in an evening of original songs and heartfelt stories.

title: Kygo: Live at the Hollywood Bowl
synopsis: Join Norwegian electronic music superstar Kygo onstage and behind the scenes as he performs at the famed L.A. venue with a bevy of special guests.

title: Bo Burnham: Make Happy
synopsis: Combining his trademark wit and self-deprecating humor with original music Bo Burnham offers up his unique twist on life in this stand-up special.

title: Fred Armisen: Standup For Drummers
synopsis: For an audience of drummers comedian Fred Armisen shares and demonstrates his thoughts on musical genres drummer quirks regional accents and more.

title: Reggie Watts: Spatial
synopsis: The comic innovator delivers a surreal set blending experimental songs jokes about grits guns and drugs and other improvised comedy adventures.

title: Taylor Swift reputation Stadium Tour
synopsis: Taylor Swift takes the stage in Dallas for the reputation Stadium Tour and celebrates a monumental night of music memories and visual magic.

title: Tim Minchin And The Heritage Orchestra Live
synopsis: Flanked by a full orchestra Tim Minchin takes the Royal Albert Hall by storm with a wonderfully witty evening of satirical musical comedy.

title: Tim Minchin: So F**king Rock
synopsis: Comedic pianist Tim Minchin performs a host of his catchy songs that touch on everything from the Middle East to the healing power of canvas bags.

title: Garfunkel and Oates: Trying to be Special
synopsis: Garfunkel and Oates put on a surprise-filled show in Seattle in hopes of raising enough money to make their own comedy special.

title: Springsteen on Broadway
synopsis: Bruce Springsteen shares personal stories from his life and acoustic versions of some of his best-known songs in an intimate one-man show.

title: My Cousin Rachel
synopsis: A young Englishman plots revenge against his late cousin's mysterious, beautiful wife, believing her responsible for his death. But his feelings become complicated as he finds himself falling under the beguiling spell of her charms.

title: Naked Among Wolves
synopsis: As WWII comes to an end, a group of Buchenwald's emaciated prisoners risk their lives for the safety of the camp's youngest inmate: a four-year-old Auschwitz-born Jewish prisoner. Is there a future for the Buchenwald boy?

title: Deviant Love
synopsis: In a tailspin after her marriage collapses Jamie falls for a helpful gentleman whose interest in her welfare hides sinister motives.

title: My Teacher, My Obsession
synopsis: When Riley changed schools she didn't expect the girls to crush on her English teacher dad. And he didn't expect a disturbing infatuation.

title: The Drowning
synopsis: Child psychologist Tom Seymour's testimony helped convict a boy of murder. Years later their paths cross again raising uncomfortable questions.

title: Money
synopsis: Two corporate spies with a $5 million haul for selling secrets are held hostage by a thief triggering a game of cat and mouse to gain the upper hand.

title: Fractured
synopsis: After his wife and injured daughter disappear from an ER a man conducts a panicked search and becomes convinced the hospital is hiding something.

title: Along Came a Spider
synopsis: When a girl is kidnapped from a prestigious prep school a homicide detective takes the case teaming up with young security agent.

title: Awake
synopsis: After an accident leaves him with no recollection of who he is a man becomes a prime suspect in the search for a serial killer targeting young women.

title: Fallen
synopsis: A tough homicide cop faces his most dangerous assignment when he must stop a murderous evil spirit who can move from one host to the next.

title: The Game
synopsis: Nicholas receives an unusual birthday present from his brother Conrad – a gift certificate to play a unique kind of game formulated by "CRS.

title: Detour
synopsis: Convinced his stepfather caused the crash that left his mother in a coma a law student drunkenly agrees to his murder then can't rescind the deal.

title: Small Town Crime
synopsis: When a disgraced ex-cop discovers a dying woman he's compelled to track down her killer – an act of self-redemption that takes him down a dark path.

title: Killer Cove
synopsis: An unlucky woman finds a solution for her hateful ex a trying job hunt and a stalker through a charming P.I. – only to endure a new set of problems.

title: Two Graves
synopsis: A doctor and a drug addict kidnap the son of a local gangster seeking revenge for the death of a loved one.

title: A Kind of Murder
synopsis: Obsessed with an unsolved murder case a crime novelist stuck in an unhappy marriage fantasizes about killing his wife who soon turns up dead.

title: The Student
synopsis: When a law professor fails an ambitious student for academic dishonesty he goes to terrifying lengths to seek revenge for more than just his grade.

title: Bad Match
synopsis: A player who uses the internet to facilitate his womanizing ways is tormented when he spurns a persistent woman who won't take no for an answer.

title: Inconceivable
synopsis: A couple trying to conceive invite a woman with a mysterious past to move in with them. But it's an invitation they might come to regret.

title: Staged Killer
synopsis: After a popular morning television host bumps into an old acquaintance with a dark past her professional and personal lives begin to unravel.

title: The Wrong Babysitter
synopsis: A widow searches for her missing teenage daughter not knowing that her seemingly helpful neighbor is hiding a terrible secret.

title: Cop Car
synopsis: Two mischievous boys get thrust into a game of cat and mouse with a murderous psychopath after they decide to steal a police officer’s cruiser.

title: American Hangman
synopsis: A judge’s kidnapping is streamed live on social media as a vengeful loner puts him on trial for supposedly sending an innocent man to his death.

title: Lizzie Borden Took an Ax
synopsis: This made-for-TV drama chronicles the scandal and enduring mystery surrounding Lizzie Borden who was tried in 1892 for axing her parents to death.

title: Secret Obsession
synopsis: When Jennifer wakes up with amnesia after a traumatic attack her doting husband cares for her. But she soon realizes the danger is far from over.

title: We Belong Together
synopsis: A divorced professor shares a night of passion with a troubled student who quickly develops an unhealthy – perhaps deadly – infatuation.

title: Only Mine
synopsis: After dating a charming cop who turns into an obsessive stalker a small-town girl must save herself from his deadly ways.

title: Apaches
synopsis: A young journalist is forced into a life of crime to save his father and family in this series based on the novel by Miguel Sáez Carral.

title: Frequency
synopsis: A detective seizes a precious opportunity to change the past when she finds she can communicate with her deceased estranged father via a time warp.

title: Skylines
synopsis: A hip-hop producer gets hurled into the violent world of organized crime when the record label he signs to becomes the center of a deadly drug business.

title: The Inmate
synopsis: A former Marine poses as an inmate inside a Mexican prison in order to infiltrate a gang suspected of kidnapping a U.S. judge's teen daughter.

title: The Good Cop
synopsis: When he's not solving murders a pathologically honest detective tries to keep an eye on his crooked but kindhearted dad.

title: Criminal: France
synopsis: Secrets emerge and entire cases unravel inside a police interview room in Paris where suspects and investigators face off in an intricate dance.

title: Criminal: Germany
synopsis: In the interview room detectives go head-to-head with suspects and try to get to the truth – even if it means breaking the rules and risking it all.

title: Criminal: Spain
synopsis: Psychological games abound between detectives and suspects in a tense interrogation room where the search for answers sometimes comes at a moral cost.

title: Monkey Twins
synopsis: Inspired by Khon dance drama and Thai martial arts a fighter scarred by the past joins forces with a determined cop to battle an organized crime ring.

title: Cold Case Files
synopsis: Masterful detectives utilize forensic science and criminal psychology to re-examine long-standing cases.

title: Al Hayba
synopsis: In a village by the Lebanon-Syria border the head of an arms-smuggling clan contends with family conflicts power struggles and complicated love.

title: Unbelievable
synopsis: After a young woman is accused of lying about a rape two female detectives investigate a spate of eerily similar attacks. Inspired by true events.

title: Age of Rebellion
synopsis: At their high school a group of unruly teens wreak havoc face bullies and navigate turbulent lives beyond school grounds.

title: Nowhere Man
synopsis: Two nefarious schemes taking place 10 years apart entangle a dauntless triad member who must break out of prison to rescue a loved one.

title: Tunnel
synopsis: A detective finds himself 30 years in the future and must solve a string of grisly crimes before he can return to the past.

title: Terrorism Close Calls
synopsis: Law enforcement officials look back on attempted terrorist attacks that were thwarted in the nick of time.

title: Drug Squad: Costa del Sol
synopsis: Four intrepid and impulsive police officers form a special narcotics unit to combat the birth of drug trafficking on Spain's Costa del Sol in the 1970s.

title: The Liar
synopsis: At the CARE detective agency investigators see a lot of action but must always keep their cases secret even when it affects their personal lives.

title: Black Money Love
synopsis: After a cop's fiancée and a jewelry designer's father are found dead together the two bereaved ones face a perilous aftermath of a theft gone wrong.

title: Spotless
synopsis: The law-abiding owner of a crime scene cleaning service is forced into business with a powerful mob boss thanks to his irresponsible older brother.

title: The Lies Within
synopsis: After her father dies and her husband goes missing Kim Seo-hui teams up with detective Jo Tae-sik and joins the National Assembly.
